an2.21-31:4.3: Yo ca accayaṃ accayato na passati, yo ca accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhāti.
an2.21-31:5.3: Yo ca accayaṃ accayato passati, yo ca accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti.
an2.21-31:7.3: Duṭṭho vā dosantaro, saddho vā duggahitena.
an2.21-31:7.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhantī”ti.
an2.21-31:9.3: Yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpeti, yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpeti.
an2.21-31:9.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhantīti.
an2.21-31:10.3: Yo ca abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpeti, yo ca bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenāti dīpeti.
an2.21-31:10.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ nābbhācikkhantī”ti.
an2.21-31:12.3: Yo ca neyyatthaṃ suttantaṃ nītattho suttantoti dīpeti, yo ca nītatthaṃ suttantaṃ neyyattho suttantoti dīpeti.
an2.21-31:12.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ abbhācikkhantī”ti.
an2.21-31:14.3: Yo ca neyyatthaṃ suttantaṃ neyyattho suttantoti dīpeti, yo ca nītatthaṃ suttantaṃ nītattho suttantoti dīpeti.
an2.21-31:14.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve tathāgataṃ nābbhācikkhantī”ti.
an2.21-31:16.1: “Paṭicchannakammantassa, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati pāṭikaṅkhā—
an2.21-31:17.1: Appaṭicchannakammantassa, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati pāṭikaṅkhā—
an2.21-31:19.1: “Micchādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati pāṭikaṅkhā—
an2.21-31:21.1: “Sammādiṭṭhikassa, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññatarā gati pāṭikaṅkhā—
an2.21-31:24.1: Sīlavato, bhikkhave, dve <span class="var" title="devo vā manusso vāti (mr)" id="note33">paṭiggāhā—
an2.21-31:26.1: “Dvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamāno araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevāmi.
an2.21-31:26.3: Attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ sampassamāno, pacchimañca janataṃ anukampamāno.
an2.21-31:26.4: Ime kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, dve atthavase sampassamāno araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevāmī”ti.
an2.21-31:28.4: Samatho, bhikkhave, bhāvito kamatthamanubhoti?
an2.21-31:28.12: Rāgupakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā, bhikkhave, cittaṃ na vimuccati, avijjupakkiliṭṭhā vā paññā na bhāvīyati.
an2.21-31:28.13: Iti kho, bhikkhave, rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttī”ti.
